Talk_Ready_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Oh! Phew, it's just you, partner. I should
have known you'd use the darkness to
move about without being seen.
Talk_2100:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:ZeldaTalkPositive_01>Oh, Link! You came to save me! You
recognize who I am, right? Zelda!

I knew you'd come and save me. Quickly,
do something to open this cage!
Talk_3003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'll head off and start pecking away at an
article about the Yiga Clan's scheme.
People need to know the truth!
Talk_Ready_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Oh! Phew, it's just you, partner. I should
have known you'd use my morning
grogginess to sneak up on me.
Talk_2101:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What's this?


"Yiganapping of Princess Zelda? Bold
Declaration of Foul Crime!"

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The Yiga are that group of Sheikah who
went rogue and have it out for the royal
family of Hyrule...
"We have taken Zelda to the carved-out
heart of the towering twins!"

That's disturbing imagery...<sp:5:1:0> Hmm,
"twins"... Do they mean <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>? 

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>That's really close to here. Could it be...
Talk_3004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01>We'll let you off easy for now, but don't
get used to it! 

<sp:3:0:2:0901>We won't hold back next time!<sp:5:0:0>
Be prepared!
Talk_Ready_1008:
Hmph, my feathers really are ruffled,
aren't they?
Talk_Ready_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Oh! Phew, it's just you, partner. I should
have known you'd turn this midday hour
to your advantage and sneak up on me.
Talk_2103:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>"Yiganapping of Princess Zelda? Bold
Declaration of Foul Crime!"

Rereading that headline doesn't soften
the blow at all... This leaves me with a pit
in my stomach.
And this declaration. "The carved-out
heart of the towering twins..." What could
it mean?
I keep turning it over in my head. Twins...


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Wait, could the twins be...<clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>?
And it's right by the stables too!
Talk_Search_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>The message the Yiga Clan left behind...


"We have taken Zelda to the carved-out
heart of the towering twins!"

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>"Twins" must be connected to Dueling
Peaks Stable, but that's all I've got...

<sp:3:0:2:0900>The chirps and warbles around this
story are far too important to ignore.
The princess's life could be on the line!
Keep your eyes and ears open for any
new clues!
Talk_2010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:ZeldaSurprise_03>Only the valiant, golden-haired knight
known as Link could move such a sturdy
cage like that!
Talk_2011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Bwahaha, I knew we'd lure in some heroic
wannabes if we used Zelda as bait, but
we've even managed to snare you!
Talk_Excape_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?


You're saying the Yiga sent us that letter
all to lure YOU into a trap?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Er, why would the Yiga give a hoot about
you, partner? Kinda tootin' your own horn
there a little bit?
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Aaanyway, getting back on track here...<sp:5:1:0>
It's a huge relief knowing that Princess
Zelda hasn't actually been kidnapped!
Talk_Search_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm keeping watch in case anything
suspicious happens, but it's hard to
see much at night...
Talk_2012:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Beware_04>All right, everybody. This is definitely the
golden-haired golden boy. Get him!
Talk_Ready_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Oh! Phew, it's just you, partner. I should
have known you'd use the setting sun as
a distraction to sneak up on me.
Talk_Search_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm checking the perimeter of the stable
for anyone acting suspicious.<sp:5:1:0>
Nothing yet...
Talk_2013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hey, don't worry! Once we find the real
Zelda, we'll send her to join you! Promise!
Talk_Ready_1011:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01>She was kidnapped!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>Have you heard of the <clr:0000>Yiga<clr:ffff>, partner?


They're a gang of lowlifes who
worship an evil entity and plot
against Princess Zelda...
<sp:3:0:2:0900>And now they claim that they've
kidnapped her!

What's more, they're not even worried
about being found. In fact, they sent
a message to the newspaper.
"We have taken Zelda to the carved-out
heart of the towering twins!"

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Understandably, Ms. Traysi is all worked
up over this news!
Talk_Search_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm keeping watch, but I doubt the Yiga
are dumb enough to try anything during
the day.
Talk_2014:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Greeting_00>You can't run, coward! We won't let you
get away!
Talk_Search_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>Oh! Hey, partner! You heard anything?
Any new chirps and warbles?
Talk_Search_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can't help but think of this rain like
someone's tears. I hope Princess Zelda
is safe...
Talk_Ready_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh! No, you spooking me isn't what I'm
talking about! Although that did a number
on me too...
She... I mean, Princess Zelda was...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:5:0:0>Princess Zelda...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_3000:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:CallFar>Hey, partner!<sp:5:0:0> What are you up to
down there?
Talk_Ready_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I came here because the word "twins"
made me think of Dueling Peaks Stable.

But I haven't found any other clues so far.
There must be something...

<sp:3:0:2:0900>Partner, we cannot allow the chirps and
warbles of evil to go unanswered!
Talk_3001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've been circling the area for leads. I was
sure that the word "twins" in that vicious
letter was referring to Dueling Peaks.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Now I'm not so sure. I've found nothing
at all anywhere around here.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>What about you? Have you figured
anything out on your end?
Talk_Ready_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Oh! Phew, it's just you, partner. I should
have known you'd use the rain to move
about more quietly.
